verses.verse: <S%G1223>Therefore<s%> <S%G5124><s%> we <S%G1163>ought<s%> to give the <S%G4056>more<s%> <S%G4056>earnest<s%> <S%G4337>heed<s%> to the things which we have <S%G191>heard,<s%> <S%G3379>lest<s%> <S%G3379>at<s%> <S%G3379>any<s%> <S%G4218>time<s%> we should let them <S%G3901>slip.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G2980>spoken<s%> by <S%G32>angels<s%> was <S%G949>steadfast,<s%> and <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3847>transgression<s%> and <S%G3876>disobedience<s%> <S%G2983>received<s%> a <S%G1738>just<s%> <S%G3405>recompense<s%> of <S%G3405>reward;<s%>

<S%G4459>How<s%> shall we <S%G1628>escape,<s%> if we <S%G272>neglect<s%> <S%G5082>so<s%> <S%G5082>great<s%> <S%G4991>salvation;<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> at the <S%G746>first<s%> <S%G746>began<s%> <S%G2983><s%> to be <S%G2980>spoken<s%> by the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and was <S%G950>confirmed<s%> to us by them that <S%G191>heard<s%> him;

<S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4901>also<s%> <S%G4901>bearing<s%> them <S%G4901>witness,<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> with <S%G4592>signs<s%> and <S%G5059>wonders,<s%> and with <S%G4164>divers<s%> <S%G1411>miracles,<s%> and <S%G3311>gifts<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to his own <S%G2308>will?<s%>
For to the <S%G32>angels<s%> has he not <S%G5293>put<s%> in <S%G5293>subjection<s%> the <S%G3625>world<s%> to <S%G3195>come,<s%> <S%G4012>whereof<s%> <S%G3739><s%> we <S%G2980>speak.<s%>

But <S%G5100>one<s%> in a <S%G4225>certain<s%> place <S%G1263>testified,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> is <S%G444>man,<s%> that you are <S%G3403>mindful<s%> of him? <S%G2228>or<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of man <S%G444><s%>that you <S%G1980>visit<s%> him?

You <S%G1642>made<s%> him a <S%G1024>little<s%> <S%G1642>lower<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> the <S%G32>angels;<s%> you <S%G4737>crowned<s%> him with <S%G1391>glory<s%> and <S%G5092>honor,<s%> and did <S%G2525>set<s%> him <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of your <S%G5495>hands:<s%>

You have <S%G5293>put<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things in <S%G5293>subjection<s%> <S%G5270>under<s%> his <S%G4228>feet.<s%> For in that he <S%G5293>put<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> in <S%G5293>subjection<s%> under him, he <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> that is not <S%G506>put<s%> <S%G506>under<s%> him. But <S%G3568>now<s%> we <S%G3708>see<s%> not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G5293>put<s%> <S%G5293>under<s%> him.

But we <S%G991>see<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> was <S%G1642>made<s%> a <S%G1024>little<s%> <S%G1642>lower<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> for the <S%G3804>suffering<s%> of <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G4737>crowned<s%> with <S%G1391>glory<s%> and <S%G5092>honor;<s%> that he by the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> should <S%G1089>taste<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> for <S%G3956>every<s%> man.

For it <S%G4241>became<s%> him, for <S%G3739>whom<s%> are <S%G3956>all<s%> things, and by <S%G3739>whom<s%> are <S%G3956>all<s%> things, in <S%G71>bringing<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> to <S%G1391>glory,<s%> to <S%G5055>make<s%> the <S%G747>captain<s%> of their <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G5048>perfect<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3804>sufferings.<s%>

For <S%G5037>both<s%> he that <S%G37>sanctifies<s%> and they who are <S%G37>sanctified<s%> are <S%G3956>all<s%> of <S%G1520>one:<s%> for <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G156>cause<s%> he is not <S%G1870>ashamed<s%> to <S%G2564>call<s%> them <S%G80>brothers,<s%>

<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> I will <S%G518>declare<s%> your <S%G3686>name<s%> to my <S%G80>brothers,<s%> in the <S%G3319>middle<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> will I <S%G5214>sing<s%> <S%G5214>praise<s%> to you.

And <S%G3825>again,<s%> I will <S%G3982>put<s%> my <S%G3982>trust<s%> in him. And <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold<s%> I and the <S%G3813>children<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1325>given<s%> me.

For as <S%G1893>much<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> as the <S%G3813>children<s%> are <S%G2841>partakers<s%> of <S%G4561>flesh<s%> and <S%G129>blood,<s%> he <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G3898>likewise<s%> <S%G3348>took<s%> <S%G3348>part<s%> of the <S%G846>same;<s%> that <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> he might <S%G2673>destroy<s%> him that <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G2904>power<s%> of <S%G2288>death,<s%> that is, the <S%G1228>devil;<s%>
And <S%G525>deliver<s%> them <S%G3745>who<s%> through <S%G5401>fear<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> were <S%G3956>all<s%> their <S%G2198>lifetime<s%> <S%G1777>subject<s%> to <S%G1397>bondage.<s%>
For <S%G1222>truly<s%> he <S%G1949>took<s%> not <S%G1949>on<s%> him the nature of <S%G32>angels;<s%> but he <S%G1949>took<s%> <S%G1949>on<s%> him the <S%G4690>seed<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham.<s%>

<S%G3606>Why<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> things it <S%G3784>behooved<s%> him to be <S%G3666>made<s%> <S%G3666>like<s%> to his <S%G80>brothers,<s%> that he might be a <S%G1655>merciful<s%> and <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> in things pertaining to <S%G2316>God,<s%> to <S%G2433>make<s%> <S%G2433>reconciliation<s%> for the <S%G266>sins<s%> of the <S%G2992>people.<s%>
For in that he <S%G846>himself<s%> has <S%G3958>suffered<s%> being <S%G3985>tempted,<s%> he is <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G997>succor<s%> them that are <S%G3985>tempted.<s%>
